WorkItem.ClosedComment: Web Essentials does the minified js and preview panel; please contact that project.
WorkItem.Description:
This is very necessary, please consider to made in the version 1.0

also the preview panel is very useful and helpful.
WorkItem.Summary: Create or update the minified js file(min.js) on save *.ts file

Comments.Message:
I think you'e confusing web essentials with TypeScript. TypeScript does not yet provide minification.

There's an work item out for minification: https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/157
